backend/main.mo: Defines user tasks, profiles, daily content, and admin role management with bootstrap admin flow and authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries specifying related files, components, and test IDs for prayer time fixes and error handling.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files and components for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the main React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, route guards, theme provider, and auth-aware routing logic including admin redirection.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminAccess: UI shown when a user lacks admin rights, offering bootstrap admin option and principal copy action.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DailyC: Carousel that auto-rotates through daily content with loading, empty, and error states.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DailyO: Displays six daily task tiles using task data and completion status, with loading skeletons while fetching. Computes wajib and sunnah prayer counts and renders task summaries.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DailyP: Shows a daily progress bar based on completed tasks and handles loading and empty states. Calculates completion percentage and displays item counts.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DateSe: Provides a popover date picker button using a calendar component. Allows selecting a date and emits changes to the parent.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Monthl: Renders an interactive SVG line chart of daily percentages with tooltips for hover/touch. Calculates plot points and manages tooltip state.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Prayer: Displays prayer times for the selected date with timezone selection, loading skeletons, and error handling. Fetches times via usePrayerTimes and renders them in a grid.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Yester: Shows yesterday’s tilawah, tahfidz, and murojaah summaries with loading skeletons. Fetches previous day's task data and formats verse ranges.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Renders the footer with current year, branding, and a referral link. Displays a heart icon and app identifier in the link.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Displays the authenticated user header with theme toggle, profile menu, and navigation links including admin options. Uses auth and user profile hooks for state.
Defines the main app layout with header, footer, and routed content area. Wraps the page in a full-height flex container.
frontend/src/components/reports/Download: Provides a UI card to select date ranges and export tasks as CSV or PDF by querying the backend and triggering a file download.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeProvi: Implements a theme context with light, dark, and system modes, persisting user preference and applying it to the document root.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Fasting: Displays and updates daily fasting status and notes by fetching and saving task data to the backend.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Murojaa: Lets users input and save Murojaah surah and verse ranges with validation, syncing changes to the backend.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Sedekah: Shows sedekah status and triggers donation flow by recording completion and opening a configured payment link.
frontend/src/components/tracking/SholatM: Provides toggle switches for each prayer time and saves updated prayer completion states to the backend.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Tahfidz: Allows entering and saving Tahfidz surah and verse ranges with validation, updating the corresponding task data.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Tilawah: UI component for viewing and editing daily tilawah data, loading existing task values and saving updates via backend mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Provides authentication state, user role/admin status queries, and login/logout utilities using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendQueries.ts: React Query wrappers for backend actor calls, including user profile, roles, admin actions, and daily task queries/mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, storing identity, and handling login states.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrayerTimes.ts: Computes and validates prayer times for a selected date with timezone persistence, error handling, and auto-refresh at midnight.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining a light/dark theme with Islamic-inspired color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminGatePage.t: Checks authentication and admin privileges before granting access to the admin panel, showing loading, error, or access-denied states as needed.
Hosts the admin panel with tabbed navigation for managing users, content, statistics, and app settings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DailyContentTab: Allows admins to view, edit, and save daily Qur'an reflection, hadith, and motivational content, with preview and validation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/SettingsTab.tsx: Lets admins configure global app settings, primarily the sedekah payment link, with loading and save handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/StatisticsTab.t: Renders admin statistics UI with date filters, total users, and placeholder participation metrics. Uses backend hooks to load users and show basic stats when triggered.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UserManagementT: Provides UI for listing users and creating new accounts via dialog with validation and backend mutations. Supports principal entry, profile fields, and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard, loading the user profile, handling profile setup, and displaying daily tracking modules and content based on the selected date.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides a login screen that triggers authentication and redirects users to their intended destination or the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/MonthlyProgressPage.t: Displays monthly progress analytics with charts and stats, fetching tasks for the selected month and allowing navigation between months.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Generates a CSV string from task data, converting timestamps and formatting worship-related fields. Includes CSV escaping for safe output.
frontend/src/utils/date.ts: Provides timestamp/date conversion helpers and utilities for formatting and navigating dates. Includes functions for today’s timestamp and HTML date input formatting.
frontend/src/utils/month.ts: Utility functions for month calculations such as start/end dates, day counts, labels, and day arrays. Simplifies monthly calendar operations.
frontend/src/utils/pdf.ts: Builds a simple text-based PDF Blob summarizing tasks for a date range without external libraries. Formats worship data into a readable PDF structure.
frontend/src/utils/prayerTimes.ts: Calculates Indonesian prayer times using simplified astronomical formulas per timezone. Includes helper functions for solar position and angle-based prayer calculations.
frontend/src/utils/progress.ts: Computes completion percentage and item counts for tasks, treating five daily prayers as a single required unit. Supports progress display logic for daily tasks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash for routing and token handling.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validates surah and verse range inputs, ensuring required fields and proper numeric ordering.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes project state, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features for the Ramadhan Tracker app.
